data.actual_result: You are led to the middle of the message instead.
data.expected_result: You should be led to the top of the message, where your pinged message starts.
data.short_description: You will be led to a random spot of the message you were pinged in when you click on a mention with 50+ lines, and another 50+ lines of text underneath.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be mentioned in a message that has over 50 lines (I pinged my main with my alt to test this) - Type another 50+ lines underneath. - Go to the recent mentions, and click on the 50+ lines mention.
